body:
My favorite commit message words are:

1. fix (used 1236 times)
2. added (used 912 times)
3. merge (used 825 times)
4. add (used 787 times)
5. update (used 782 times)
Commits: - 7bb232e: fix namespace issues - a04a41c: fix parse query - 2b33b14: fix check - 622bbb2: fix rewrite rules - 2b24639: fix namespace issue
Commits: - cb49288: fix search and add escaping - 83cdbee: fix pagination - df9c3a5: fix search entity - 703451d: fix error when status_array is empty
Commits: - 7da5bc6: fix nodeinfo endpoint - c180644: Fix Extra-Fields handling (#886) - 15cff15: Fixed: Content handling for Podcasts (#883)

Commits: - 6e7ab31: fixed tag-generation - da9b934: fixed response - 32f635f: fixed response - 694cbeb: fixed get_indienews_xyz_url - 3d8b49f: fixed category link - e326305: fixed indieweb.xyz integration

desc: Happy February 29th! I committed on a Leap Day!

desc: I found the answer to the ultimate question of life, the universe, and everything!
I committed on Friday the 13th, One‚Ä¶ By One‚Ä¶
